prompts: Create a fiery creature with a blue body and bright orange flames on its back.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies both fire and speed, with sleek features and vibrant colors.
Design a fire-type Pokemon that has a playful personality, complete with a dynamic flame tail.
Imagine a Pokemon that lives in forests, featuring a mix of warm colors and agile movements.
Generate a creature with a bold color palette of orange and blue, perfect for fierce battles.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a small, fiery fox, full of energy and ready to explore.
Give me a unique Pokemon that combines fire and agility, with distinctive flame patterns.
